name: @gov-design-system-ce/styles
description: This package includes Gov Design System CE Styles.
author: Zdeněk Vítek

scripts.build: npm run copyAll && npm run sass && npm run copyAllFinished && npm run sassGlobal && npm run sassContent && npm run sassLayout && npm run sassCritical && npm run sassPrint && npm run copyDist
scripts.copyAll: copyfiles --up 2 ./../core/src/components/**/*.scss lib/components_ && copyfiles --up 2 ./../core/src/components/**/**/*.scss lib/components_ && node run.js
scripts.copyAllFinished: copyfiles --flat lib/components_/**/*.css lib/components && copyfiles --flat lib/components_/**/**/*.css lib/components && rimraf lib/components_
